snippet: At the Frederick Law Olmsted awards luncheon of the Women’s Committee of the Central Park Conservancy, a favorite hat shape was the satellite dish, defying gravity on the side of the head.
abstract: At the Frederick Law Olmsted awards luncheon of the Women’s Committee of the Central Park Conservancy, a favorite hat shape was the satellite dish, defying gravity on the side of the head.

headline.main: Video: Bill Cunningham On the Street, Hats Off
